Frequently Asked Questions

Is Skill Swap really free to use?

Absolutely! Skill Swap is built on the principle of peer-to-peer exchange. There are no monetary transactions requiredâ€”only the fair exchange of knowledge and time between users. Your commitment is only to teach the skill you offered.

How does the "swapping" process actually work?

The process is simple: you browse the skills marketplace, find a skill you want to learn, and propose a trade using one of the skills you offer. If the other user accepts, the swap moves to your 'My Swaps' dashboard where you can begin your learning sessions.

What happens if a user is unresponsive during a swap?

We encourage clear communication from the start. If communication breaks down, you can report the issue through your 'My Swaps' dashboard, and the platform will review the exchange and provide options to resolve or cancel the swap gracefully.

What kind of skills can I offer or request?

Almost anything! Our community swaps skills ranging from professional topics (Web Development, Data Analysis) to personal hobbies (Gardening, Baking, Instrument Playing) and practical skills (Resume Writing, Car Maintenance). If you know it, you can swap it!
